    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Miner

        Miner​(Block block,
      int diffbits)
        Constructor
        パラメータ:
        block - is the current latest block.
        diffbits - is the current difficulty bits.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getHashValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<Result> getHashValues()
        Obtaining hash values from outside. It requires mutual exclusive access.
        戻り値:
        Return a list of Results mined with the size defined at maxMiningValues (100 as a default).

      • createDigest

        public static java.lang.String createDigest​(Block block)
        Creates a digest string from a block.
        パラメータ:
        block - is the block to generate hash values by using its block header.
        戻り値:
        Return a digest string as String.

      • setBlock

        public void setBlock​(Block block)
        Sets new block as the latest block.
        パラメータ:
        block - is the current latest block.

      • updateBlock

        public void updateBlock​(Block block)
        Updates the latest block.
        パラメータ:
        block - is the block set as the latest block.

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock()
        Gets the latest block.
        戻り値:
        Return the latest block registered.

      • resetNonce

        private void resetNonce()
        Reset the nonce counter.

      • getNonce

        public long getNonce()
        To get the current nonce.
        戻り値:
        Return the current nonce value as long.

      • setDifficultyBits

        public void setDifficultyBits​(int bits)
        Sets new difficulty bits.
        パラメータ:
        bits - is a new difficulty bits.

      • getDifficultyBits

        public int getDifficultyBits()
        To get the current difficulty bits.
        戻り値:
        Return the current difficulty bits as int.

      • incDifficultyBits

        private void incDifficultyBits()
        Increments the difficulty bits (but it is not used this time...).

      • createInitialBlock

        public Block createInitialBlock()
        Creates an initial block by using mining().
        戻り値:
        Return an initial block.

      • createHashedDigest

        public static java.lang.String createHashedDigest​(java.lang.String digest,
                                                  long nonce)
        Creates a hash value using the sha3_256 algorithm from a digest and a nonce.
        パラメータ:
        digest - is a digest of a block header.
        nonce - is the current nonce.
        戻り値:
        Return a hashed digest as String.

      • generatingTarget

        public static java.math.BigInteger generatingTarget​(int diffbits)
        Generates a target for mining. The value should be the block hash if it is smaller than the target.
        パラメータ:
        diffbits - is the difficulty bits to generate the corresponding target.
        戻り値:
        Return the generated criterion of mining as BigInteger.

      • getTarget

        public java.math.BigInteger getTarget()
        getTarget is to get the current target.
        戻り値:
        Return the current criterion of mining as BigInteger.

      • mining

        private java.util.ArrayList<Result> mining​(Block block)
        Mining hash values using the latest block. It generates the designated num. of hash values declared as maxMiningValues.
        パラメータ:
        block - is the current latest block in the chain.
        戻り値:
        Return a list of Result including mined hash values and nonce values.

      • isHit

        public static boolean isHit​(java.math.BigInteger target,
                            java.math.BigInteger hashValue)
        Judgeing the hash value is eligible or not according to the target.
        パラメータ:
        target - is the target to judge hash values.
        hashValue - is a mined hash value.
        戻り値:
        Returns true if the hash value is smaller than the target and it is eligible as new block hash.
